{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xircom |model=APWE1120 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/27/2001 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=MXF-WX1560 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2 |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=No Wires Needed |cpu1_model=Poldhu |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV1614T |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=EliteMT |ram1_model=M12L16161A |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=No Wires Needed |wi1_chip1_model=Poldhu |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Lucent |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=169.254.107.28 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:90:4B |oui_eth=00:90:4B }} [http://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/files/vendors/Xircom/APWE1100/ Downloads]
By default, the access point will attempt to use DHCP to obtain an IP address. If it fails it will assume the IP of 169.254.107.28. The AP does have a web configuration interface.
The power adapter included with the device is a '''Delta''' ADP-10SB REV: H (5V, 2A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate.
